snippet: If "Mad Men" wins for outstanding drama, it will surpass records set by "The West Wing, "L. A. Law" and "Hill Street Blues," which each won that category in four consecutive years.
abstract: If "Mad Men" wins for outstanding drama, it will surpass records set by "The West Wing, "L. A. Law" and "Hill Street Blues," which each won that category in four consecutive years.

headline.main: Emmy Nominees: Matthew Weiner of 'Mad Men'
